name: Muscle Cars Racing Mania
description:
Enjoy the world of speed and sportcars with a new Muscle Cars Racing Mania!
This game contains all best from racing games and put it in one best car stunts simulator.
Muscle Cars Racing Mania will let you experience the fun and adrenaline of racing!

Features:

- Next Gen Graphic
- Muscle Cars HD Cars
- High detailed tracks
News and bonuses on official page https://www.facebook.com/pages/Extreme-Games/1531656503724867
